Setting.name: Api key for using Mandrill
Setting.Description: Mandrill api key for sending transactional emails

Setting.name: Don't send to Mandrill
Setting.Description: Leave as true for testing emails within CoSaCS only. When set to false, scheduled emails will be passed to Mandrill for actually sending to customers. Note that Mandrill can additionally be used in 'test mode' as an extra layer of testing

Setting.name: User Address
Setting.Description: The email address to which customers notification emails will be sent
